General.Name: Chongqing Sifang New Material Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Chongqing Sifang New Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of commercial concrete in China. The company also produces sand and gravel aggregates for construction. It integrates industrial chain operation of sand and gravel aggregate mining, dry-mixed mortar, asphalt, water-stabilized layers, and prefabricated buildings. Its products are used in real estate development and roads, bridges, tunnels, water conservancy, other infrastructure construction, and other fields. The company was founded in 2003 is based in Chongqing, China. Chongqing Sifang New Material Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Yichun Zhuozhi Commercial Center (Limited Partnership).
